manifest.description: A function that takes an SVG arc curve as input, and maps it to one or more cubic bezier curves
manifest.name: svg-arc-to-cubic-bezier

scripts.build: npm run build:modules && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:umd: npm run build:umd:dev && npm run build:umd:pro
scripts.prepublish: npm run tidy && npm run build
